Articles.Content: Greetings everyone, my name is James. Just wanted to say hello and make myself known on the forums, a place I feel I will be spending a lot of time on in the future. I\'ve played the demo for KSP a couple of times in the past and always loved the game, and finally decided to take the plunge and purchase it. As a budding shipbuilder, I know I\'ll probably be here often with lots of questions to ask, so I\'m hoping patience is something many of you are good at. Judging from the forums, the community here is pretty friendly, so I\'m looking forward to getting to mingle.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
